code: var addMessage='ADD-MESSAGE';var updateMessage='UPDATE-MESSAGE';var initialState={messageData:[{id:0,message:'Hello'},{id:1,message:'How are you'},{id:2,message:'Yo'}],updateMessage:'',dialogsData:[{id:0,name:"Sergey"},{id:1,name:"Andrey"},{id:2,name:"Grisha"},{id:3,name:"Masha"},{id:4,name:"Dasha"}]};var dialogsReducer=function dialogsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var active=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(active.type){case addMessage:var newMessage={id:3,message:state.updateMessage};state.messageData.push(newMessage);state.updateMessage='';return state;case updateMessage:state.updateMessage=active.message;return state;default:return state;}};export var addMessageCreate=function addMessageCreate(){return{type:addMessage};};export var updateMessageCreate=function updateMessageCreate(text){return{type:updateMessage,message:text};};export default dialogsReducer;
